articles.description: SpaceX's Starship is poised to change the launch industry — and give space startup founders much to consider.
articles.content: SpaceXs super-heavy launch system Starship is poised to fundamentally reshape the space economy. The 394-foot-tall vehicle, which took to the skies for the first time last month, is designed to carry… [+1118 chars]
